shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content_distilled: Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: PA American Water making repairs after water main break
shorts.title_distilled: PA American Water making repairs after water main break.
shorts.description: DICKSON CITY, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Pennsylvania American Water says they were making emergency repairs after a water main break in Dickson City that began at about 3:30 p.m. Monday. Authorities explain that customers in the area may experience temporary disruptions to water service, including no water, low water pressure, and discolored or cloudy water. [...]
shorts.content: DICKSON CITY, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Pennsylvania American Water says they were making emergency repairs after a water main break in Dickson City that began at about 3:30 p.m. Monday. Authorities explain that customers in the area may experience temporary disruptions to water service, including no water, low water pressure, and discolored or cloudy water. [...]

shorts.title: Promoting alcohol awareness during dry January
shorts.title_distilled: Promoting alcohol awareness during dry January.
shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU)— How's your New Year's resolution going? Many hit the gym in the new year, and others participate in Dry January, where they give up drinking alcohol for the month. Alcohol and drug experts in NEPA say not drinking alcohol has its benefits, mentally and physically, even for those who are not considered "Problem drinkers". [...]
shorts.content: (WBRE/WYOU)— How's your New Year's resolution going? Many hit the gym in the new year, and others participate in Dry January, where they give up drinking alcohol for the month.
